title: The Accidental Harem
description: This is a story of when I screwed three different customers of my travel agency.Brady, the bull rider.Mitch, the billionaire.And John, a Navy SEAL.I do like my men.And in my line of work, I meet a lot of them.Unfortunately, this time I screwed more than the men.I also screwed up their luxury cruise.I accidentally booked all three of them in the same cabin.A cabin already occupied by Adolfo, who runs a royal casino in Monte Carlo.And when I get on the yacht to straighten it outâ€¦I screw them all.This is the story of my reverse harem.My accidental harem.Full-length HEA reverse harem comedy.Love without limits. #whychoose
author: J.J.  Knight
